Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory669.jpg'}
{3: 'A cool breeze lifts the dark velvet veil over a small table without a sign at a corner of the shopping street in the early morning.'}
{3: 'On the table are sage, crystals, and neatly arranged cards in an arc. On one side sits a mechanoid in white, and on the other, a human.'}
{2: "I've drawn my cards, Haicma.", 3: '6'}
{3: "You place the cards you've drawn from the deck and place them before the mechanoid."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Please allow me to confirm your query before we have your cards analyzedâ€”it\'s "How is the day going to go," correct?', 4: '1'}

{3: 'Not long ago, Haicma contacted you, saying she was researching card divination and hoped you could help with data collection... except you never expected her to set up a stall in the shopping street to offer free readings to passersby.'}
{3: "It's still pretty early during the day, but behind you, there is already a line of customers waiting, a few of whom are mechanoids."}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'I need you to reach out one of your hands and place it in my palm.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Haicma holds your hand gently while her other, mechanical hand brushes over the cards you've drawn."}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "So these are the cards you've drawn, huh... It's your birthday today, no?", 4: '1'}
{2: '...Did the cards tell you that?', 3: '17'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'One way to enhance the mystery of divination is to express surprise at the right moment and spice that up with certain real-life details.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Did my performance just now make the divination seem more credible to you?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'It did feel more convincing.', 3: '20', 4: 'Would have been more credible had you acted more naturally.', 5: '20'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Of course, I will take your feedback into serious consideration.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "Now, let's go through the cards... Hmm, you woke up very early today, for something special, perhaps something out of your daily routine.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Woah, right on the money.', 3: '23', 4: "It's still early morning.", 5: '23'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "Soon, you'll be rushing to your next location, where you'll be meeting many different people. I'm certain you'll be busy at the very least.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "All sorts of interesting events will keep you busy until night. I don't think you'll even have time for a nap today.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "Your birthday isn't lonely at all. It almost looks like a diplomatic event. Anyway, you'll have a fulfilling and even somewhat tiring day.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "Fortunately, our divination also comes with an energy cleanse, which can help you feel happy and less tired. I'll set up the project for you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Haicma slowly closes her eyes. When she opens them again, it seems as though she has called up some sort of data.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: '...A hunter shoots at a fox but the hunter ends up dead.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Do you know why that is?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Because the fox says, "Hunters that try to kill foxes die like losers."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "You just laughed, didn't you? I think it's a joke that brings joy. The last three people who heard it laughed out loud.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Haicma shifts her gaze over, focusing on the corners of your mouth.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'My records show that you are an exceptionally perceptive person.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: '...But it seems to take you longer to react when you face me.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As Haicma gathers the cards on the table, the cards pile into layers and rustle in her hand.'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "Things always take me by surprise when I'm with you, Not only that, I've experienced emotional logic disruptions multiple times.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: "Understanding my feelings for you is like calculating the principles of card divination. I haven't reached the bottom of that even with all my computing power.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'A mechanoid\'s "mind" only considers the rationality of actions, but I think meeting you today is something I "wanted" to do.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'When Haicma loosens her grip, a card falls back onto the velvet table.'}

{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Actually, I just took a look at your authorized, shared schedule and found some free time to meet you today. A reasonable time arrangement greatly increases the success rate of the plan.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The card has a completely different design from that of the others, with a small cake with candles in all sorts of colors painted in the middle.'}
{3: 'As the card falls, the "bystanders" who have been waiting behind suddenly gather around. Someone shouts "Three, two, one"\' and everyone shouts blessings together.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mechanoid', 3: 'Happy Birthday!!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The velvet on the table is pulled away, and a small cake identical to the one on the card slowly rises from the hole in the table.'}
{3: "Looking at the cake, both you and Haicma quickly meet each other's eyes. She breaks into a smile and pushes the birthday cake toward you."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Haicma', 3: "Don't think you could have ever seen this coming.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Haicma', 3: 'Your existence itself is a miracle born from the universe. Happy Birthday, and... good morning. I hope you have a wonderful day.', 4: '1'}
